item.title: Kaiju No. 8: The Game new key visual, character screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/kaiju-no-8-the-game-new-key-visual-character-screenshots

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Upcoming free-to-play title from Akatsuki Games.

Akatsuki Games has released a new key visual and in-game screenshots of the five main characters from its tentatively tilted Kaiju No. 8: The Game.

The screenshots showcase Kaiju No. 8, Reno Ichikawa, Kikoru Shinomiya, Mina Ashiro, and Soshiro Hoshina. Kaiju No. 8 is also featured in the new key visual.

Kaiju No. 8: The Game will be available for PC via Steam, iOS, and Android in Japan as a free-to-play title with item-based in-app purchases. A release date or global launch have yet to be announced.

View the images at the gallery.
